general: This is the configuration file for issues and tools for the conversion report

issues.found: Your Lessons pages have more than 3 levels. The Content tool in Amathuba only supports 3 levels, so you may need to re-arrange the units and pages.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your Lessons pages only have 3 or less levels

issues.found: There were links to Discussion topics in your Lessons pages. These links are transferred but reference the Forum-level not the Topic-level. You can update the links in the Amanthuba Content tool
issues.not_found: Good to go! There were no links to Discussion topics found in your Lessons pages

issues.found: There were links to Discussion forums in your Lessons pages. Currently, these links are not automatically transferred and you will need to re-add the links in the Amathuba Content tool.
issues.not_found: Good to go! There were no links to Discussion forums found in your Lessons pages.

issues.found: Some Lessons items have prerequisites. Set up Amathuba release conditions as needed.
issues.not_found: Good to go! There are no Lessons prerequisites.

issues.found: Some Lessons pages are hidden on Vula. Hide the equivalent Content pages on Amathuba as needed.
issues.not_found: Good to go! No Lessons pages are hidden.

issues.found: Your Lessons items have optional descriptions, which are not converted. Update the matching Content pages as needed.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your Lessons items do not have optional descriptions.

issues.found: Some Lessons pages contain static hyperlinks to Vula. Update the hyperlinks in the imported Content pages.
issues.not_found: Good to go! We found no static hyperlinks in your content within your Lessons pages.

issues.found: One or more Lessons pages use release dates. Set these again as needed in Amathuba.
issues.not_found: Good to go! No Lessons pages have release dates.

issues.found: There are Lessons questions with correct answers. The feedback (correct answer) is not automatically shared with the student.
issues.not_found: Good to go! No Lessons questions with correct answer.

issues.found: Some Lessons pages contain static hyperlinks to Vula. These have been highlighted in red in the converted Content pages. Review and update these links on the pages listed in Issue Details below.
issues.not_found: Good to go! No Vula lessons hyperlinks found.

issues.found: Some Lessons pages contain references to Vula tools. These have been highlighted in red in the converted Content pages. Review and update these references on the pages listed in Issue Details below.
issues.not_found: Good to go! No Vula lessons tools found.

issues.found: Some folders and/or files in Resources are hidden. Set these to hidden again in Amathuba, as needed.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your site does not contain hidden folders and files.

issues.found: Resources folders have more than 3 levels. The Content tool in Amathuba only supports 3 levels, so you may need to re-arrange the units and pages.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your Resources folders have 3 levels or less.

issues.found: Assignments in Vula use Turnitin. Configure this setting again In Amathuba.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your assignments in Vula were not using Turnitin.

issues.found: Assignments in Amathuba can have one or unlimited submissions. Update assignment settings as needed.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your assignments do not have resubmissions enabled.

issues.found: One or more assignments use anonymous grading. This setting is not carried across in the conversion.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Assignments do not use anonymous grading

issues.found: Assignments in Vula use peer review. As this is not available in Vula, consider alternatives such as Turnitin Peermark.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your assignments do not have peer review enabled.

issues.found: An honour pledge setting is not an option for Assignments in Amathuba. Consider alternatives.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your assignments do not have honour pledge enabled.

issues.found: Assignments use supplementary items (model answer, private note or all purpose item). Copy this content across manually as needed.
issues.not_found: Good to go! No supplementary items (e.g. Assignment model answers) are used.

issues.found: One or more assignments are linked to Gradebook. Update this as needed in Amathuba.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Assignments are not linked to Gradebook.

issues.found: One or more assignments are only visible to certain groups on your site. Update assignments in Amathuba for groups as needed..
issues.not_found: Good to go! Assignments are not group-scoped

issues.found: One or more assignments require group submissions. This setting is not carried across in the conversion.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Assignments do not require a group submission

issues.found: Some folders and/or files in Resources use release or retract dates. Set these dates again in Amathuba as needed.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your site does not contain folders and/or files that only become available or get retracted on certain dates.

issues.found: Some folders and/or files in Resources are set to only be released to specific groups. Configure release conditions for this in Amathuba
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your site does not contain folders and/or files that only gets released to specific groups.

issues.found: There is one or more timed tests or quizzes. Update assessments in Amathuba with these settings as needed..
issues.not_found: Good to go! T&Q assessments are not timed.

issues.found: Quiz descriptions are not shown by default in Amathuba. Update the settings for each quiz with a description
Attachments to descriptions are not converted. Update the quiz in Amathuba to include the attachment.
Quiz part descriptions are converted but are not shown by default. Update the quiz settings for each part in Amathuba.
Quiz part attachments are not converted. Update the quiz parts in Amathuba to include the attachment.
Update Quiz or Question Library items that contain inline images with Vula URLs.
Question Pools used in this site are copied to the Question Library. Assessments that use them need updating.
issues.not_found: Good to go! The site does not include any T&Q Question Pools

issues.found: Hotspot questions are not supported in Amathuba. Change these to another question type.
issues.not_found: Good to go! You have not used a hotspot question.

issues.description: Tests & Quizzes Student Audio Response question
issues.found: Audio response questions are not a question type in Amathuba. Use a short answer question in which students leave a voice recording in response.
issues.not_found: Good to go! You have not used an audio response question in Vula.

issues.description: Tests & Quizzes Extended Matching Items question
issues.found: Extended Matching Items are not supported. Reformat these into another question type, such as a fill-in-the-blank question.
issues.not_found: Good to go! You have not used an extended matching items question in Vula.

issues.description: Tests & Quizzes multiple choice negative marking
issues.found: Negative markin is not supported for MCQs in Amathuba. Update these assessments as needed.
issues.not_found: Good to go! You have not used negative marking in any of your MCQs in Vula.

issues.found: If you used “e” scientific notation for powers (e.g., “3.456e11” as “3.456 x 1011 ”), you may need to review your question, as Amathuba's “Significant Figures” question type supports powers as separate fields, but does not support scientific notation within a single field.
issues.not_found: Good to go! You have not used a calculated question in Vula.

issues.found: These are translated into Amathuba Fill in the Blank questions, which don't support numeric ranges. Recreate these as Significant Figures questions if needed.
issues.not_found: Good to go! You have not used a numeric response question in Vula.

issues.description: Tests & Quizzes Fill in the Blank question
issues.found: You have used a Fill in the Blank question. Currently, there may be issues if there are multiple responses/answers in the question. Please review your question.
issues.not_found: Good to go! You have not used a Fill-in-the-Blank question in Vula.

issues.found: You have used question-level feedback. In Amathuba, you can provide overall feedback on a question but not specific in/correct answer.
issues.not_found: Good to go! You have not used question-level feedback in Vula.

issues.found: Anonymous grading was used in your quizzes. This setting is not transferred.
issues.not_found: Good to go! T&Q does not use anonymous grading

issues.found: One or more assessments are linked to the Gradebook. This setting is not transferred.
issues.not_found: Good to go! T&Q not linked to gradebook

issues.found: Discussion Forums and/or Topic descriptions have attachments.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Forums and Topics do not have attachments

issues.found: Discussion Forums and/or Topics have availability dates set. This needs to be re-setup in Amathuba.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Forums and Topics do not use availability dates

issues.found: Discussion Forums and/or Topics have default Gradebook items, and this needs to be re-setup.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Forums and Topics are not linked to Gradebook

issues.found: Weightedr categories are used in this site's Gradebook. Set these up again in Amathuba.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Gradebook does not use weighted categories

issues.found: Links to converted checklists do not work for instructors. Update these links in Content Builder.
issues.not_found: Good to go! No Lessons checklists for instructors found.

issues.found: Lessons pages contain custom CSS. Check that the Content pages in Amathuba display correctly.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your Lessons pages do not contain custom CSS.

issues.found: Recreate sections as groups in Amathuba. For student signup, use self-enrollment groups.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your site does not contain sections.

issues.found: Your site contains ad-hoc groups. Set these up again in Amathuba.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your site does not contain ad-hoc groups.

issues.found: Some files in Resources have different names to the original filename. Rename these in Amathuba as needed
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your site does not contain files with different display names.

issues.found: Your site contains folders that have different display names to what you see in Vula
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your site does not contain folders with different display names.

issues.found: Some files in Resources have file extensions that are not allowed in Amathuba. These have been zipped in the import process.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your site does not contain any filenames with disallowed extensions.

issues.found: Some audio or video files in Resources are in formats not supported by Amathuba and have been converted for import
issues.not_found: Good to go!

issues.found: This site uses one or more External Tools (LTI). These need to be re-setup.
issues.not_found: Good to go! Your site does not use LTI tools.

tools.name: Chat Room
tools.found: Choose one of these suggested alternatives such as MS Teams or Padlet.

tools.name: Commons
tools.found: Use a Course homepage with the Activity Feed

tools.name: Course Evaluation
tools.found: A new Course Evaluation system is coming. For now, choose an alternative.

tools.name: Course Outline
tools.found: Content page in Amathuba

tools.name: Dashboard
tools.found: Course homepage in Amathuba

tools.name: Dropbox
tools.found: Choose an alternative such as OneDrive

tools.name: Email Archive
tools.found: Use Announcements in Amathuba or an alternative

tools.name: External Tool (LTI)
tools.found: Supported in most cases but needs to be set up

tools.name: External Tool (Linktool)
tools.found: Not supported in Amathuba. Use an LTI tool instead.

tools.name: Group manager
tools.found: Use Course Info / Groups in Amathuba

tools.name: Lecture Videos (Series)
tools.found: Contact the CILT Helpdesk for setup assistance.

tools.name: Lessons
tools.found: Content in Amathuba

tools.name: Messages
tools.found: Use Classlist / Email or an alternative

tools.name: Participants
tools.found: Course Info / Classlist in Amathuba

tools.name: Polls
tools.found: Surveys in Amathuba

tools.name: Postem
tools.found: Use Gradebook or choose a recommended alternative.

tools.name: Q&A
tools.found: Use Forums, Content pages or a recommended alternative.

tools.name: Resources
tools.found: Manage Files in Amathuba presented through Content

tools.name: Rubrics
tools.found: Contact the helpdesk for assistance with migrating Rubrics

tools.name: Section Info
tools.found: Use Course Info / Groups in Amathuba

tools.name: Sign-Up
tools.found: Choose a recommended alternative

tools.name: Overview
tools.found: Content page in Amathuba

tools.name: Statistics
tools.found: Course Info / Class Progress in Amathuba

tools.name: SMS
tools.found: Amathuba does not support SMS messaging. Consider using the ICTS Bulk SMS Service.

tools.name: Test and Quizzes
tools.found: Quizzes in Amathuba

tools.name: User Alias
tools.found: Contact CILT to discuss alternative ways to meet this need

tools.name: Web Content
tools.found: Weblinks in the Content tool

tools.name: Wiki
tools.found: Choose a recommended alternative
